Body: To add further to cerberus's interesting answer and mitch's comment, conjunctive and subjunctive are not fully similar from a functional point of view. I recently asked on GLU, why German prescribes the use of modus instead of tempus for marking indirect speech. So this is one important difference vs. most other languages using tempus or no marking at all for indirect speech. Being a german native speaker and having Latinum, I never heard ther term Subjunktiv in a language course. So hippietrail is imo right here, it doesn't exist in German.
